#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<bitset>
#include<deque>
#include<list>
#include<queue>
#include<stack>
#define getcx getchar_unlocked
using namespace std;

inline void inp( long long int &n )
{
   n=0;
   long long int ch=getcx();
   long long int sign=1;
   while( ch < '0' || ch > '9' )
     {
       if(ch=='-')sign=-1;
         ch=getcx();
     }
   while(  ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
           n = (n<<3)+(n<<1) + ch-'0', ch=getcx();
   n=n*sign;
}


long long int sumfact(long long int x)
{
	long long int p, i;
	long long int pro=1;
	for(i=2; i*i<=x; i++)
	{
		p=1;
		while(x%i==0)
		{
			p=(p*i)+1;
			x=x/i;
		}
		pro=pro*p;
	}
	if(x>1)
	{
		pro*=1+x;
	}
	return pro;
}

int main()
{
	long long int t, x;
	inp(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		inp(x);
		printf("%lld\n", sumfact(x)-x);
	}
	return 0;
}
